Events that occurred on 22 June.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1911 - J.R.R. Tolkien and several other cadets of King Edward's School's Officer Training Corps line the route at the Coronation of George V. Tolkien stands near Buckingham Palace.[1]
1920 - Voice actor Paul Frees is born.
1932 - Actress Prunella Scales is born.
1952 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 133.
1953 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 137d.
2007 - "Age's End", the seventeenth and last set in The Lord of the Rings Trading Card Game, is released.
2009 - Tolkien's Bag End is published.
2010 - The RiffTrax commentary of The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King is released online.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 2942:
Bilbo returns to Bag End[2] and learns he has been declared dead.

content.content:
↑ J.R.R. Tolkien; Humphrey Carpenter, Christopher Tolkien (eds.), The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien, Letter 306, (undated, late 1967 - early 1968), 2nd footnote
↑ J.R.R. Tolkien, The Lord of the Rings, "Prologue", "Of the Finding of the Ring"
